name: Hacker News
description: Collects Hacker News stories and comments

optionsSchema.description: HackerNews connector options - each connector tracks ONE content type

search_query.description: Search term to find HN stories and comments (brand/product name)

content_type.description: Content type: ONE type per connector for reliable checkpointing. Create separate connectors for different types.

story_ids.description: Track specific story IDs (optional, only used with story content types)

lookback_days.description: Number of days to look back for historical data. Default: 365 (1 year). Maximum: 730 (2 years).
